definition: basin/flower pot/unit of volume equal to 12 斗[dou3] and 8 升[sheng1], approx 128 liters/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Their trunks are as gnarled as bonsai.
sentences.chinese: 這些柳樹的樹幹盤根錯雜，彷彿盆景一般。

sentences.english: They shift the place of tree planting into building, but they plant basin scenery at home.
sentences.chinese: 把路邊上植樹的地方又來蓋樓房，在家裏在盆景。

sentences.english: The west garden in Liuhua Park is a famous miniascape garden and one of the excellence Lingnan Gardens.
sentences.chinese: 流花西苑是廣州著名的盆景園，也是嶺南園林的精品。

sentences.english: He likes the shape of that potted landscape.
sentences.chinese: 他很喜歡那個盆景的造形。

sentences.english: Or perhaps because I have seen it created in a bonsai style.
sentences.chinese: 或許因爲我曾經見過它創造了盆景風格。

sentences.english: It seems that those who like Penjing are not in the minority.
sentences.chinese: 看來喜歡盆景的人不在少數。

sentences.english: The characters in planning and design of Congtai pcnjing garden in Handan city are described in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了邯鄲市叢臺盆景園規劃設計的特點。

sentences.english: Water or mist the terrarium sparingly, but keep it moist.
sentences.chinese: 在水晶球盆景中要放置水或霧收集器，以保持水分。

sentences.english: Today I bought a Bonzai at Como Park. It is called Fujian Tea.
sentences.chinese: 今天我在動物園的花店裏買了一盆景，名叫福建茶。

sentences.english: The Golden Section appears time and time again within Bonsai rules.
sentences.chinese: 黃金分割在盆景規則中反覆出現。

sentences.english: No. 8 tomb at Penjingyuan in Sanmenxia city is a coffin tomb in the early Warring States period.
sentences.chinese: 三門峽市盆景園8號戰國墓爲戰國早期偏晚的棺槨墓。

sentences.english: The existing bonsai not only beautifies the environment, but also is good for body health of people;
sentences.chinese: 現有的盆景既美化了環境又有益於人類的身體健康。

sentences.english: Penjing(bonsai) art originates from China at the period of the Wei and Jin Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 盆景藝術源於中國，形成於魏晉南北朝時期。

sentences.english: In China, a pen is usually compared to a three - dimensional picture.
sentences.chinese: 在中國，盆景常被比作三維立體圖畫。

sentences.english: The retiree is painstakingly nurturing his bonsai.
sentences.chinese: 這爲退休老人精心培養他的盆景。

sentences.english: Use human skull as a pot to grow a traditional mini-bonsai.
sentences.chinese: 用頭蓋骨做盆蒔植保守微型盆景。
